 1997-14841997-10-090,  ,  VAC,  ,  , 
PrecisReappointment of SHIRLEY F. CHEEVERS, of Ottawa, Ontario, and MAURICE DUPLESSIS, of Sainte-Foy, Quebec, as permanent members of the Veterans Review and Appeal Board to hold office during good behaviour for a term of six months, effective October 1, 1997.
